Dialogues.Text: How wonderful! You seek further power. You continue to drink of the Essence. Truly wonderful! We shall sate your desire.
With this essence, none shall be able to escape you! You shall dart forth at a wicked speed, and strike at the hearts of your enemies! Your wrath shall boil their very blood!
When nearest your foes, every strike shall tear Ambrosia from their very being!
Now go forth! Conquer thy foes in our name! Breed righteous slaughter that we might be avenged!
